about_the_game:
This art pack contains all the artworks used in the game in 4K resolution.
  • 20 high quality artworks
Just go into the game's installation location, find the Art Pack folder, and enjoy!

And a very big thank you from all of us at Kawaii Dev!
By purchasing this DLC you are helping us make more and better games!
